name: Abseil
description: Conquer wild heights in reverse. Get really good at checking ropes.

name: Bicycle
description: Get a great cardio workout while you explore your world.
imageUrls: https://lifebuffet.org/res/cycling-6895 by Hans Braxmeier on Pixabay.jpg

name: Embroider
description: Create delicate works of art in breathing fabric.

name: Football / Soccer
description: Kick balls into nets, and have fun doing it
imageUrls: https://lifebuffet.org/res/soccer-7056003 by Dimitris Vetsikas on Pixabay.jpg

name: Geocache
description: Hunt for treasures others have hidden.

name: Hike
description: Explore the wild spaces of your world, alone or with friends.

name: Ice skate
description: Glide over ice and feel like you're flying.
imageUrls: https://lifebuffet.org/res/skates-4199003 by Manfred Richter on Pixabay.jpg

name: Knit
description: Make lovely chunky garments and such.

name: Quilt
description: Join three or more layers of fabric together to create a three-dimensional padded surface.

name: Sew
description: Bend garments to your will. Learn about the magic of correctly-fitting clothes.

name: Skateboard
description: Ride your sweet chrome into the sunset!

name: Spelunk
description: Venture into the deep places of the world.
imageUrls: https://lifebuffet.org/res/spelunk by Colin Behrens on Pixabay.jpg

name: Table tennis
description: Test your reaction time and dexterity in an intense head-to-head battle.

name: Tennis
description: Hit balls back and forth across a large court.

name: Volleyball
description: I don't like sand. It's coarse and rough and irritating and it gets everywhere.

name: Weave
description: Create cloth itself with your very own fingertips. And perhaps a loom.
